verses.1: Topa aw, na heh laitak hong taii kei inla, lung so sa-in hong thuhilh kei in.
verses.2: Topa aw, thaneem ka hih manin kei tungah dikna hong zang in. Topa aw, ka guh ka taang na mahmah ahih manin hong damsak in.
verses.3: Ka hingim mahmah hi. Topa aw, bang tanvei nang hong zekai lai ding na hi hiam?
verses.4: Topa aw, hong kihei inla, kei hong hon in. Itna kip a nei pa na hih manin keimah hong hon in.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh misite omna gam sungah nangmah phawk theih nading bangmah om lo ahih manin, Leinuai panin kua in nang hong phat thei ding ahi hiam?
verses.6: Ka tautauna-in ka gim hi. Zan sialin ka khitui in ka lupna tum a, ka kahkahna-in ka lupna kawt dikdek hi.
verses.7: Dahna hangin ka mit mial a, ka galte º hong bawlna hangin ka mit zung zaw semsem hi.
verses.8: Siatna a bawlte khempeuh aw, ka kiang panin kihem khia un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ka kahna aw a za hi.
verses.9: Topa in keima thumna hong za khinzo a, Topa in ka thungetna hong sang ta hi.
verses.10: Ka galte khempeuh zahhuai mahmah in genthei ding uh hi. Amaute nungkikin maizumna thuak pah ding uh hi.
